property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: The default replication factor of files on HDFS

property.name: dfs.blocksize
property.description: The default block size in bytes of data saved to HDFS

property.name: dfs.namenode.rpc-bind-host
property.description: controls what IP address the NameNode binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.

property.name: dfs.namenode.servicerpc-bind-host
property.description: controls what IP address the NameNode binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-bind-host
property.description: controls what IP address the NameNode binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.

property.name: dfs.namenode.https-bind-host
property.description: controls what IP address the NameNode binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.

property.name: nfs.dump.dir
property.description: A temporary working directory for files coming into the HDFS proxy.

property.name: nfs.metrics.percentiles.intervals
property.description: Enable the latency histograms for read, write and commit requests. The time unit is 100 seconds in this example.

property.name: nfs.exports.allowed.hosts
property.description: Host permissions for connecting to the proxy.

property.name: dfs.permissions.supergroup
property.description: The name of the group of Hadoop super-users.

property.name: dfs.namenode.safemode.threshold-pct
property.description: Specifies the percentage of blocks that should satisfy the minimal replication requirement defined by dfs.namenode.replication.min. Values less than 1.0 mean the namenode exits safemode even if some blocks are under-replicated. For development/testing, 0.0 allows immediate exit from safemode.

property.name: dfs.blockreport.initialDelay
property.description: Delay in seconds before first block report after datanode startup. Set to 0 for immediate reporting.

property.name: dfs.heartbeat.interval
property.description: Heartbeat interval in seconds between datanode and namenode

property.name: dfs.namenode.heartbeat.recheck-interval
property.description: Time in milliseconds to recheck datanode heartbeat status

property.name: dfs.blockreport.intervalMsec
property.description: Interval in milliseconds for datanode to send periodic block reports
